text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Let the press know when/where #medicalsupplies deliveries are happening. The press can document #Trump's work! 

Seeing #federal #government assistance = a USA morale booster

#econtwitter #WhiteHouseBriefing #TestingTestingTesting
#WhiteHouse #COVID19 #publichealth #tests
